function.name: create_note
function.description: This tool creates a new markdown note in an Obsidian vault. It should be used when the user asks to create a note.

location.description: The location is a relative path in the file system. It can go under "1 - Projects", "2 - Areas", "3 - Resources", or "4 - Archive". You can use a subfolder of one of those or even a full path for the location if the user specifies it.

markdown_contents.description: The content for the note. It should be in markdown format.
